abilities.name: Aerial Deployment
abilities.rule: If this model starts the game in Hover mode and in Strategic Reserves, it can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules.

abilities.name: Command Uplink
abilities.rule: Each time you select the bearer’s unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

wargear_abilities.name: Command Uplink
wargear_abilities.rule: Each time you select the bearer’s unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

wargear_options: ■ This model’s command uplink can be replaced with 1 chaff launcher.
